examples: Find a hobby.
After all, love will find a way.
Water will always find its own level.
She found a dirty stain on her favorite shirt.
The court found in her favor.
words.defineEn: to discover or get back something or someone that we had lost, after searching for it or them
words.defineVi: để khám phá hoặc lấy lại một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó mà chúng tôi đã mất, sau khi tìm kiếm nó hoặc họ

examples: Accidents like this happen all the time.
The most recent incident happened only a week ago.
The same thing happened to me.
Change doesn't happen overnight.
The door happened to be unlocked.
words.defineEn: to take place, particularly with no plan
words.defineVi: diễn ra, đặc biệt là không có kế hoạch

examples: The hole calls the thief.
The organization called the new regulations a turning point in the campaign against smoking.
To call a meeting/strike.
A classic hot chocolate recipe calls for scalded milk to be mixed with cocoa powder and sugar.
You call that mercy?
words.defineEn: to telephone a place or person
words.defineVi: gọi điện thoại cho một địa điểm hoặc một người

examples: Put your name here.
Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
Election season always puts my dad's back up.
This job puts years on you.
Put your clothes in the cupboard.
words.defineEn: to move someone or something into a place and let them be there
words.defineVi: để di chuyển một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó vào một nơi và để họ ở đó

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: to feel that someone or something is good, enjoyable, or interesting
words.defineVi: để cảm thấy rằng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó là tốt, thú vị, hoặc thú vị

examples: The support of our families has helped enormously.
Helping you?
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
His help is useful as a chocolate teapot.
words.defineEn: to give someone what they need or to make doing something easier or possible for them
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho ai đó những gì họ cần hoặc để làm điều gì đó dễ dàng hơn hoặc có thể cho họ

examples: After all, love will find a way.
He loved gardening.
They loved the sun-dried tomato and mozzarella-filled pansotti.
I love the vibrant green color of Granny Smith apples.
I love the crunch of romaine lettuce in my sandwiches.
words.defineEn: to have very strong feelings for someone or something that is important to us and we like a lot and want to take care of
words.defineVi: có tình cảm rất mãnh liệt với ai đó hoặc điều gì đó quan trọng đối với chúng ta và chúng ta rất thích và muốn chăm sóc

examples: The soldiers kept the attackers at bay.
Her father kept a grocer's shop.
The big fellow keeps a fish shop near the post office.
The master kept a weekly journal.
Always keep a backup of the file.
words.defineEn: to have or continue to have something
words.defineVi: để có hoặc tiếp tục có một cái gì đó

examples: The unexpected challenges became grist for the mill of their problem-solving skills.
Short hair really becomes you.
The child will become an adult.
The new office block has become an expensive white elephant.
The old government program has become a sacred cow.
words.defineEn: to start or grow to be
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu hoặc phát triển để được

examples: The clock on my computer screen shows the current time and date.
A white blouse will show the blood.
The photographs clearly show a broken window.
This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
The report showed an increase in sales.
words.defineEn: to make something visible or noticeable
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó có thể nhìn thấy hoặc đáng chú ý

examples: I heard the tiny squeak of a mouse in the walls.
I hear the sound of seagulls near the sea.
To hear both sides of the argument.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
Have you heard the news?
words.defineEn: to notice the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để ý đến âm thanh mà một người hoặc vật đang tạo ra

examples: The interviewer asked me a series of questions during the job interview.
Better ask teacher about.
Can I ask a favour of you?
Can I ask a question?
Did you ask the price?
words.defineEn: to use words in a question form or tone to get answers from someone
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ trong một hình thức câu hỏi hoặc giai điệu để có được câu trả lời từ một ai đó

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Red wine leaves a stain.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to go away from somewhere or someone
words.defineVi: đi khỏi một nơi nào đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: To learn a language/skill/trade.
High time you learned a thing or two.
He learned about the different departments within the police organization.
She learns about the laws of physics and the properties of matter in her science lessons.
I learned about different breeds of cows and their characteristics.
words.defineEn: to gain knowledge of or skill in something by experience, by study, or by being taught
words.defineVi: để đạt được kiến thức hoặc kỹ năng trong một cái gì đó bằng kinh nghiệm, nghiên cứu, hoặc bằng cách được dạy

examples: That experience changed my life.
The storekeeper changed my dollar bill for four quarters.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The wind has changed direction.
The lights changed to green.
words.defineEn: to make a person or thing different
words.defineVi: để làm cho một người hoặc điều khác nhau

examples: She moved her queen.
Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
She moved the tray to a side table.
We moved our chairs a little nearer.
She moved the ball toward the opponent's goal.
words.defineEn: to go from one place to another; to change position
words.defineVi: đi từ nơi này đến nơi khác; để thay đổi vị trí

examples: The cloudy sky created a dramatic backdrop for the sunset.
Reindeer moss creates a soft carpet-like cover on the forest floor in northern regions.
The government has created eight new peers.
The combination of ripe cherimoya and coconut milk created a heavenly dessert pudding.
As the chef, I created a special pizza with ranch sauce instead of traditional tomato sauce.
words.defineEn: to bring something into existence or make something happen
words.defineVi: để đưa một cái gì đó vào sự tồn tại hoặc làm cho một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: She lived a very peaceful life.
She lives just a stone's throw away from the beach.
He lives far from the city center.
He lived in a small town with friendly neighbors.
She lived in the same village from the cradle to the grave.
words.defineEn: to have your home in a specific place or to share it with a particular person
words.defineVi: để có nhà của bạn ở một nơi cụ thể hoặc để chia sẻ nó với một người cụ thể

examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.
The bedside radio played softly.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
words.defineEn: to enjoy yourself and do things for fun, like children
words.defineVi: để tận hưởng bản thân và làm những điều cho vui, giống như trẻ em

examples: Rugby and art seem strange bedfellows.
The vision seems a flight of fancy.
Neither one seems like the sharpest pencil in the box.
The people seem to have swallowed the government's promises hook, line, and sinker.
The company's new strategy seems to be on course, with positive results so far.
words.defineEn: to appear to be or do something particular
words.defineVi: xuất hiện hoặc làm một cái gì đó cụ thể

examples: Next add the flour.
The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
A slice of sweet orange adds a delightful touch to a cold glass of iced tea.
Farmer's cheese adds a delightful creaminess to my morning bowl of granola and fruit.
The agar cubes added a delightful chewiness to the tropical fruit salad.
words.defineEn: to put things together to make them bigger in size or quantity
words.defineVi: để đặt mọi thứ lại với nhau để làm cho chúng lớn hơn về kích thước hoặc số lượng

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The bad weather brought famine.
The revolution brought many changes.
Retirement often brings with it a massive drop in income.
words.defineEn: to take someone or something to a place or to come to a place with someone or something
words.defineVi: đưa ai đó hoặc cái gì đó đến một nơi hoặc đến một nơi với ai đó hoặc cái gì đó

examples: She understands the importance of good design.
I fully understand the reason for your decision.
Do you understand the instructions?
I understand his feelings up to a point.
Nobody understands me.
words.defineEn: to know something's meaning, particularly something that someone says
words.defineVi: để biết ý nghĩa của một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó mà ai đó nói

examples: Always remember that.
I'll always remember this holiday.
He couldn't remember the name of the movie for the life of him.
Remember Jackson.
I don't remember my first day at school.
words.defineEn: to bring a type of information from the past to our mind again
words.defineVi: để đưa một loại thông tin từ quá khứ vào tâm trí của chúng tôi một lần nữa
